articles.title: AI Stocks Surge as NVIDIA Reports Record Revenue
articles.content: NVIDIA Corporation reported record quarterly revenue driven by strong demand for AI chips. The company's stock price surged 15% in after-hours trading, leading to renewed speculation about AI market valuations.

analysis.title: AI Stocks Surge as NVIDIA Reports Record Revenue

articles.title: Tech Giants Invest Billions in AI Infrastructure
articles.content: Microsoft, Google, and Amazon announced combined investments of over $50 billion in AI infrastructure. This massive capital injection has raised concerns about potential overinvestment in the AI sector.

analysis.title: Tech Giants Invest Billions in AI Infrastructure
